post.text: Watch live as Bernie Sanders joins Hillary on the trail in New Hampshire.

comment.author: Billy
comment.text: I find it so interesting some of the Bernie supporters are turning on him now. I guess his opinions and truth aren't so important now for all those #Bernieites. He is making sense. Too bad you don't see it. I bet you are feeling the BERN now.

replies.author: Kelly
replies.text: Most will. 85% have so far. There is always some that cannot get pass the past.

replies.author: Billy
replies.text: Kelly I think it is more than the past. I think their lack of allegiance now proves they were never really in support of that which Bernie stands. They picked a candidate and it quickly became about their own egos. To them, Bernie's opinion doesn't matter now. They are freaked out because they can't "win". It isn't about Hillary or Bernie. It is about them now. It is sad, but true.

replies.author: Kelly
replies.text: It is early yet. It takes a bit to get pass not getting something you worked hard for. I honestly think most will decide what is best. Bernie will play an important part in a Hillary presidency. He will have no influence in a Trump presidency.

replies.author: Billy
replies.text: Nerdy Chic You are preaching to the choir. You don't have to school me on Bernie. I grew up with him because I am that old. My comment has to do with how some of his supporters are turning on him now because he has made this decision. If they are so supportive, why are they turning against him now? It is because their support wasn't grounded in conviction. BTW I have always been a Bernie supporter, but I have to go with this flow because I am not stupid. Being stubborn or wanting to be a martyr for the cause will not help our country now. If Trump gets elected, we might not have a country anymore. I think you might be the one who is confused. Check yourself.
